projects.name: EXPENSE TRACKER
projects.description: Developed an interactive web application using React and React Router DOM. Empowered users to efficiently manage and track their expenses. Leveraged advanced features of React Router for dynamic forms, loaders, and actions, Implemented local storage to ensure seamless data persistence across user sessions.

projects.name: NETFLIX WEB-APP
projects.description: Developed a React-based Netflix clone app, enabling users to browse and stream movies and TV shows. Proficient in React development and API integration. Developed interactive web applications showcasing expertise in React, API integration, and front-end technologies. Utilized React Router and Axios for seamless navigation, and data retrieval from TMDb API.

projects.name: PORTFOLIO WEBSITE
projects.description: Developed a responsive portfolio website using React, showcasing projects and skills. Demonstrated proficiency in React, React Router for navigation, style components for design consistency. Deployed on Netlify for easy accessibility.

experiences.description: Acquired practical expertise in web development through hands-on experience. Demonstrated proficiency in front-end technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and React. Enhanced website functionality and user experience by implementing front-end frameworks and technologies.
Utilized frontend frameworks like React, Worked on a diverse range of projects, and enhanced practical skills.
contributed to the 4-star rating of the college through various activities of the E-cell. Successfully worked as a coordinator and organizer at TEDxAKGEC 2022.
Made and deployed a responsive website with a team of 3 using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Collaborated with CSI members to plan and execute a successful ideathon event.
